sub_title: Executive & Management Assistant | Office Assistant & HR Administration: ⏩ Organizational Synergizer ✔ Administrative Efficiency Champion
summary:
💡  "Geared to invigorate administrative efficiency and organization-wide productivity through meticulous oversight, strategic process optimization, and proactive action."

Hello 👋🏼, I'm Roy, 

 I'm a strategic-minded and proactive Administrative Professional backed by a comprehensive track record in optimizing organizational efficiency through personalized operational and administrative support. Over the years, my forward-thinking approach has enabled me to excel in various roles, carving a niche in office administration, HR, and cross-functional collaboration. 🌟

As a linguistically versatile professional with proficiency in English and Swahili and a basic understanding of Hungarian and Dutch, I skillfully facilitate global collaborations, breaking language barriers and fostering productive international relationships. 🌎

Currently working at Invisible Talent as the Administrative Assistant, I leverage my robust organizational skills and manage executive-level business administration functions, streamline communication processes, and manage complex agendas and schedules for the Founder. Additionally, I've demonstrated a strong aptitude for streamlining employee onboarding processes through organizing and coordinating online interviews and orienting new staff members to effectively integrate them into the team. I am adept at organizing training webinars and developing e-learning materials, fostering a culture of continuous learning. 🎓

🔷 Some of my key career achievements include:
➥ Showcasing a robust background in executive administrative support, consistently fostering solid relationships with team leaders, colleagues, and stakeholders.
➥Recognized for my solution-driven attitude and in-depth knowledge in handling time-sensitive, highly confidential information, scheduling meetings, completing key deliverables, and managing events and complex calendars. 
➥Proven expertise in HR administration, managing employee onboarding processes, and effectively integrating new hires into the team.
➥Skilled at pinpointing strengths and weaknesses and adept at enacting changes in-office procedures to improve productivity and positively impact the bottom line.

Looking forward to connecting and discussing how my skills and experiences can help drive your team's success! 🤝

school.name: The University of Buckingham (UK) – IBS International Business School Budapest, Hungary

education.field_of_study: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration & Management with a major in Tourism

company.name: Invisible Talent – A Globalyzed B.V. Company

profile_positions.company: Invisible Talent – A Globalyzed B.V. Company
profile_positions.description:
As the Administrative Assistant at Invisible Talent, a leading career coaching and consultancy company in The Netherlands,  I effectively support the Founder and Career Coach by managing daily administrative tasks, overseeing communications, and streamlining business operations.

🏆  𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬:
❑ Elevating Administrative Support: Providing day-to-day admin support to the Founder and Career Coach, including managing emails, correspondences, online memos, and database upkeep, enhancing operational efficiency. 

❑ Streamlining Communication:  Analyzing, organizing, and prioritizing incoming and outgoing correspondence, and professionally handling telephone calls, ensuring seamless communication flow.

❑ Efficient Meeting Organization and Calendar Management: Organizing and coordinating virtual meetings and agendas on platforms such as Microsoft Teams and Zoom, improving virtual communication. 

❑ Organizing Online Training Events: Regularly organizing webinars, employee training sessions, and developing e-learning materials, promoting continuous learning and skill enhancement within the team.

❑ Streamlining Employee Onboarding: Coordinating and organizing interviews, employee onboarding, and orientation activities, ensuring new hires are effectively integrated into the team.

❑ Facilitating Project Management: Assisting in coordinating and tracking progress of various projects, contributing to their timely and successful completion.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant

profile_positions.description:
During my university studies, I worked as a part-time Employee Trainer and Coordinator at Indupro KFT, a manufacturing company, managing all aspects of employee operations, including onboarding, training, and administrative functions.

🏆  𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬:
 ❑  Enhanced Employee Onboarding: Successfully coordinated the onboarding of 15 new student employees, effectively integrating them into the team and bolstering company productivity.

❑  Optimized HR Administration: Managed employee-related administrative functions, including contracts, visas, payroll, benefits, travel, and training, streamlining HR operations.

❑ Refined Scheduling Management: Prepared and maintained accurate records of employee schedules, leading to a 25% decrease in scheduling errors and enhancing operational efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Employee Trainer & Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
While still a student at IBS, I joined Marienka KFT and was assigned to the Logistics Department. In this role, I managed inventory by tracking goods, recording arrivals, and monitoring rebranding and local shipment. I also analyzed inventory levels to identify products to keep and reduce, ensuring optimal stock levels.

🏆  𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬:
❑ Refined Inventory Management: Managed inventory by tracking goods, recording arrivals, monitoring rebranding, and ensuring timely and accurate shipments of products.

❑ Optimized Stock Levels: Analyzed inventory levels to identify products for retention or reduction, ensuring optimal stock levels and reducing wastage.

❑ Detail-Oriented Management: Demonstrated exceptional attention to detail in managing inventory records and maintaining accurate inventory levels earning commendation from management for reliability.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Focused on continuing to grow my professional skillset, I traveled to Doha, Qatar, for an entry-level job opportunity as a Junior Finance Administrator. The experience was enlightening as I got to work with individuals from diverse cultures and learned about the UAE business culture. 

🏆 𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬:
❑ Drove Cost Efficiency: Successfully worked with diverse, multicultural teams to identify expenses that needed to be reduced, resulting in cost-cutting measures for the company.

❑ Ensured Financial Compliance: Efficiently managed financial records and documentation, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.

❑ Robust Stakeholder Relationships: Maintained strong relationships with stakeholders, including suppliers and clients, contributing to positive business outcomes and customer satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Junior Finance Administrator

skills: Understanding of Business Processes and Strategies
